name: post-checkAccountHolder
description: Triggers the verification of an account holder even if the checks are not yet required for the volume that they are currently processing.

accountHolderCode.description: The code of the account holder to verify.

accountStateType.description:
The state required for the account holder.
> Permitted values: `Processing`, `Payout`.

tier.description: The tier required for the account holder.
